title: Dungeons & Dragons | The Official Home of D&D | Dungeons & Dragons
text: The Pugilist Class (2024) from Sterling Vermin Adventuring Co. brings bare-knuckle brawling to your table with a scrappy, streetwise class built to thrive when the fight gets ugly. Create your next legendary adventurer with the help of D&D Beyond! Whether you’re forging a spell-slinger, a sword-swinger, or something entirely unique, your character’s journey begins here.
